name: Simple Chess (itch) (Fergo310)
description:
Sit back, relax, and enjoy some simplicity.

Simple Chess started out as just a little prototype I had to make for a group project in a course on Games & Society. I had so much fun making it however, I decided to flush it out complete with music, a timer, and even castling! I hope you have as much fun playing this simple game as I did making this simple game.

*Note: Comments and Feedback would be very appreciated! Thank you!*
